title: Dol Utsaber Mohamilon
description: Arjo, Charu, Abir and Nirupama come together to celebrate Holi! Do not miss the singing, dancing and a fashion show with a special showstopper.

title: Nojor
description: The Singha Roys may look like a normal family, but they are reeling under the evil sight of a supernatural entity, a Daayni. And once fallen, it never leaves.

title: Rangiye Diye Jao
description: Gungun and Babin host a grand Holi party with Noah, Kian, Shankha, Mohor, Sreemoyee, and their families! Celebrate all the colours of life with your fave stars.

title: Punyi Pukur
description: Under unforeseen circumstances, Kakon gets married. Watch how her sour relationship with her mother-in-law turns sweeter with time.

title: India From Above
description: This two-part series showcases the beauty of India through its natural wonders, fascinating people, and diverse cultures from soaring heights.

title: Chuni Panna
description: What happens when Chuni, who is obsessed with ghosts, gets to live with one? A one-of-a-kind 'haunted' story with an added twist of a peculiar friendship!

title: Kora Pakhi
description: Raised by tribals, Amon aspires to be a journalist. After a chance encounter with city-bred Ankur, can she trace her roots while making a name in the big city?

title: Lawless Island
description: Lawless Island tells unique stories about the people who have chosen a different life in a remote Alaskan community.

title: Tomay Amay Mile
description: Nishith is a self-made man, who helps his wife Ushoshi realise her dream of becoming an IPS officer. Will they achieve their goal?

title: 1232 KMs
description: Weeks after the nationwide COVID-19 lockdown, seven migrant labourers, on the verge of starvation, decided to go to their village just like millions of others.

title: Phagun Bou
description: Ayandeep marries Mahul, who has feelings for Anurup. Turns out, Anurup and Ayandeep are cousins! What will happen with the three of them under the same roof?

title: Mayar Badhon
description: Strong-willed Gunja can go to any lengths for her younger sister, Ranja, even if it means sacrificing her motherhood!

title: Kiranmala
description: A warrior princess is out to reclaim her family honour. Follow Kiranmala's fascinating tale of righteousness and bravery as she takes on the evil Katkati.

title: Chokher Tara Tui
description: Tutul, a simple girl from Madhupura is infatuated with movie star Ayush. When she finally gets a chance to be with him, reality strikes her!

title: Aanchal
description: Tushu sets out to avenge the insult on her family. Watch her journey to empowerment and her attempt at making the women in her village self-sufficient.

title: Bodhuboron
description: After her marriage to a rich and affluent man, a small-town illiterate girl blossoms into a fine, modern-day woman under the guidance of her mother-in-law.

title: Bhakter Bhagaban Shri Krishna
description: Narrating the story of Lord Krishna, right from his birth to finally becoming Arjun's Saarthi in Mahabharata.

title: Irabatir Chupkotha
description: While Irabati is kind and caring, arrogant Akash has a troubled childhood. Well past their 'marriageable age', when fate brings them together, sparks fly.

title: Animals Gone Wild
description: Learn the wildness of animal behaviour with the inimitable Jaaved Jaaferi, who gives us a peek into their bizarre and fascinating world.

title: Mega Icons
description: Be a part of the journey into the life of iconic personalities through a scientific lens and conversations with friends and family.

title: Saanjher Baati
description: Ill-fated yet compassionate, Charu, a sweet maker, gets married to Arjo Mullick, a rich but deprived businessman. And, thus begins a love story like no other.

title: Khorkuto
description: Righteous Shoujonyo belongs to a middle class joint family while Gungun is a rich spoilt brat. What will happen when these two different worlds collide?

title: Khelaghor
description: A rich girl gets accidentally married to an uneducated vagabond living in a slum. In the marriage demanding countless adjustments, will love find a chance?

title: Ogo Nirupama
description: Beauty lies in the eyes of the beholder. But not in Nirupama's case when she gets married to a charming Abir. Will the marriage ever survive their differences?

title: Mohor
description: Life brings Mohor, a headstrong student to an influential college professor Shankha. Always at loggerheads, will they find support in each other?

title: Desher Mati
description: Virtuous Noah takes care of the elderly Mukherjee couple who live alone. When the rest of their family arrives, she just might help them rediscover their roots.

title: Gangaram
description: Gangaram, a charming simpleton from a village finds his way to a successful musical career when he travels to the city. But, who else is waiting for him there?

title: Sreemoyee
description: On realising that her family takes her for granted, Sreemoyee, a housewife, sets out to create a new identity for herself. A heartwarming second chance at life.

title: Dhrubatara
description: Childhood friends Tara and Agni are secretly in love with each other. But their happiness is short-lived when Dhruva, a shrewd businessman enters their life.

title: Falna
description: Little Falna is deprived of everything she deserves except her innate skill to perform magic just like her long-lost mother. Will this magic ever reunite them?

title: Gramer Rani Binapani
description: TODAY'S EPISODE IS DELAYED. Internet star Binapani is ever-ready to help her fellow villagers. What happens when Shatadru, owner of a renowned Mill company offers his position to her?

title: Boron
description: TODAY'S EPISODE IS DELAYED. Righteous Tithi has to endure the harsh consequences of spoilt brat Rudrik's actions. But when two souls at war get united in matrimony, will they find love?

title: Titli
description: Hearing-impaired, Titli aspires to become a pilot. Putting disability on backseat, she sets out to prove that even the sky is not the limit for her dreams.

title: Mahapeeth Tarapeeth
description: Set in 18th century Bengal, an enigmatic story about the origin of the famous Tarapeeth temple and Sadhak Bamakhyapa's deep devotion to Maa Tara.

title: Radha Krishna
description: Radha and Krishna's story is the epitome of eternal love, which transcends eras and emotions. Watch the epic retelling of this supreme romance.

title: Bojhena Se Bojhena
description: A lively and free-spirited Pakhi and an arrogant Aranya are drawn towards each other! What follows is an intense love-hate relationship.

title: The Legend of Hanuman
description: When the power-hungry Ravan tore through the world to unleash evil, in his way stood a humble vaanar awoken to his divinity to become an immortal legend.

title: Special Ops
description: One is a relentless hero, the other is a terror mastermind. In a race against time, Himmat Singh and his team are on a mission to end a nineteen-year long manhunt.

title: Hostages
description: Reneging on the deal to kill the CM, Prithvi plans to smuggle him to Nepal but ends up in a hostage crisis again. Amid threats old and new, a conspiracy unfolds.

title: OK Computer
description: When a self-driving car commits murder, a cyber cop and a robot rights activist team up to investigate. Who is to be held accountable? Can we really trust AI?
